attributes.action: TRAINING & TIGHTER CONTROLS FOR FOREIGN DRIVERS IN UK
attributes.additional_details:
The amount of near misses and accidents caused by inconsiderate & poorly trained foreign drivers in the UK is too high.  Personally, i am subjected to such an event daily.

Training and licencing laws may not be as stringent in countries outside of the UK and EU, which affects road safety in the UK when non UK residents and visitors are allowed to drive on the UK roads without adequate training.

Foreign migrants and visitors should be forced to perform some level of UK road safety training which MUST include road etiquette.
